GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
crypto: ccree - Fix use after free in cc_cipher_exit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 335bf1fc74f775a8255257aa3e33763f2257b676, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 63ee04c8b491ee148489347e7da9fbfd982ca2bb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: crypto: ccree - Fix use after free in cc_cipher_exit()
